attributes.action: Petition to restrict setting off fireworks in rural areas.
attributes.additional_details: Setting off fireworks in close proximity to farm animals and wildlife causes extreme distress, we think the use of fireworks near farm animals should be regulated and restricted to the 5th of November or other specified celebrations.
attributes.background: We would like parliament to discuss the impact on farm animals and wildlife in rural areas of the regular setting off of fireworks for an extended period in october and November each year.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700537
